PLATEAU Workshop
Bringing together Programming Languages and Human-Computer Interaction

PLATEAU2020
11th annual workshop on the intersection of HCI and PL
Online Edition! Friday November 20, 2020
Co-located with

LOCATION/ZOOM

PLATEAU is in SPLASH-V. Please join by finding the Zoom details for SPLASH-V here: https://splash2020.clowdr.org/. (If you search for the string "join the Zoom room to participate in the discussion" you'll find three instances—just click on the one for SPLASH-V!)

To add PLATEAU to your own calendar or see the PLATEAU workshop slot in your own timezone: https://bit.ly/35n2sIx

In honor of SPLASH's original planned location, the schedule below is in Chicago's timezone (CDT)!
